Summary: Alien encounter at Caraco Pharmaceutical Laboratories.
divs: sighting detailscaraco pharmaceutical laboratories located at 31060 oak creek, wixom, michigan and 1150 elijah mccoy drive, detroit, michigan is a hive of aliens. these aliens are capable of esp and mind control through alien technologies that may be biological but appear to have electromagnetic and radio\microwave qualities. they appear as human, but are decidedly anything but human: not unlike many of the aliens appearing in the movie men in black. you must investigate. check them out. don't be afraid to ask many questions. they will try to avoid you, although the closer you get the more you feel the effects of their mind control experiments against humans, enhanced by the generic pharmaceutical products they "push" onto innocent humans like you and me.
trends: There have been 56 other sightings in Detroit
There were no other sightings in Detroit on or around January 18th 2010
